```{=html}
<div id="donation-thermometer" style="max-width: 180px; margin: 2em auto; text-align:center;">
  <svg viewBox="0 0 100 300" style="width:100%;">
    <!-- thermometer outline -->
    <rect x="40" y="20" width="20" height="200" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#eee" />
    <!-- fill area -->
    <rect id="thermo-fill" x="40" y="220" width="20" height="0" rx="10" ry="10" fill="url(#grad)" />
    <!-- bulb -->
    <circle cx="50" cy="250" r="30" fill="url(#grad)" />
    <defs>
      <linearGradient id="grad" x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="1">
        <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#4b9fff"/>
        <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#3174ff"/>
      </linearGradient>
    </defs>
  </svg>
  <p id="thermo-label" style="margin-top:0.5em; font-weight:600;"></p>
  <a href="https://your-donation-link" class="btn btn-primary" style="margin-top:0.5em;">Donate Now</a>
</div>

<script>
  // pull from YAML params
  const raised = {{< meta raised >}};
  const goal = {{< meta goal >}};

  const percent = Math.min(raised / goal, 1);
  const fillHeight = 200 * percent;

  const fill = document.getElementById('thermo-fill');
  fill.setAttribute('height', fillHeight);
  fill.setAttribute('y', 220 - fillHeight);

  document.getElementById('thermo-label').textContent =
    `$${raised.toLocaleString()} raised of $${goal.toLocaleString()} goal`;
</script>

```
